text: The Grand Tower is a skyscraper under construction in Moscow, Russia. It will be 283.4 meters tall and will have 62 floors with 400,000 m2 of floor area.В «Москва-Сити» построят башню Grand Tower с мостами и зимними садами == Gallery == Проект Grand Tower в Москва-Сити.jpg|The future architectural appearance of the Grand Tower. Строительная площадка Grand Tower (май 2015).jpg|Construction site in 2015. == References == Category:Skyscrapers in Russia Category:Buildings and structures under construction in Russia
title: Grand Tower (Moscow)
